rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer leading to the living areas, designed to incorporate natural light with large windows oriented towards east and south. This adheres to Vastu principles by welcoming positive energy.

A generously sized living room with high ceilings and Art Deco detailing, large French doors that open outwards for cross ventilation, and ample natural light from south and east openings. Includes built-in seating areas.
A formal dining area adjacent to the living room with an emphasis on natural light through large windows on the eastern wall, ensuring a pleasant dining atmosphere.

Modern, efficient kitchen designed in Art Deco style. Natural ventilation is achieved via north-facing windows and exhaust system. It includes built-in cabinetry with geometric patterns reflective of the era.

A dedicated library area on the west side of the ground floor to enhance quiet contemplation and study, featuring floor-to-ceiling bookshelves integrated into the walls. The design includes a large window for natural light and a private seating alcove.
A well-ventilated bathroom with skylight for additional natural light, incorporating Art Deco fixtures. It is located near the kitchen area following local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
A compact space for appliances and storage, designed to optimize space and efficiency with natural light from adjacent areas.
The master suite features an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and a private balcony with west-facing windows for cooler evenings. Art Deco style is evident in the detailing.
A spacious bedroom designed to maximize natural light through south and east windows, complemented by built-in furniture following the Art Deco aesthetic.
Another well-lit bedroom ensuring adequate space and ventilation with north or east exposures as per Vastu recommendations.
A comfortable bedroom offering natural light via strategically placed windows to the south, incorporating Art Deco geometric patterns in design elements.
Well-planned bathroom area attached to one of the bedrooms ensuring privacy and ventilation. Features skylight and natural light for comfort.
